channel.title: ped on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in ped on LS | Papermod

item.title: Ginny, Part 1
item.description: A nerdy high school boy suddenly scores but his family moves. Little does he know that he actually became a dad! Years later his high school sweet heart finds him and he reconnects with her and her daughter. The daughter needs her daddy--needs him more than he was willing to admit at first.

item.title: Ginny, Part 2
item.description: A nerdy high school boy suddenly scores but his family moves. Little does he know that he actually became a dad! Years later his high school sweet heart finds him and he reconnects with her and her daughter. The daughter needs her daddy--needs him more than he was willing to admit at first.

item.title: The Woods, Part 1
item.description: Several days ago, I was sitting on my back deck enjoying the summer night air, when I heard a screen door open and close. I peeked over the railing and saw Ashley, my neighbor's 11 year old daughter. She held a battery lantern in one hand and her golden retriever in the other by a leash. I also noticed she had a backpack on. I looked at my watch and thought it was very odd for her to be out at 1am.

item.title: Uncle Chester, Part 1
item.description: Michelle's live-in uncle introduces her to oral sex

item.title: Big Favors
item.description: Slutty, submissive mom Jenny tells us about how her dominant friend Jenny decides to use her as breeding stock.

item.title: Doing Everything
item.description: 16-year old Jerry is obsessed with his 11-year old sister Ashley, as is their step-father. What Jerry sees while peeping on his kid sister today changes both of their lives for the better.

item.title: Little Jo
item.description: A young girl's mother leaves. She becomes a tomboy. This story is her sexual awaken and her becoming a young lady with desires for a neighbor boy and then her dad.

item.title: An Orgy of Child Sex, Part 2
item.description: This is episode 43 in the Pedo Ring series. It can be read alone but would be best to read at least #41 first. All the episodes are loosely linked by the central premise of a pedo ring (see'summary of episodes' for full order). This one overran a bit because orgies are complex to describe! 35yo Sean, the host, is the central male character, stepdad to the extremely sexed 10yo Hannah.

item.title: Perverted Parenting
item.description: A little girl's life of sexual abuse changes for the better after she is filmed being molested by two women and her daddy. Rewritten for Loliwood Studios.

item.title: Allie - My Little Sister, Part 1
item.description: The night it happened I was baby sitting or at least I was home with Alice, my ten year old sister, and our mother was out. I’d got a hot new video from a friend and was looking forward to watching it in peace. Allie was upstairs doing whatever it was she did when I wasn’t allowed in her room. I took the video player up to my room and hooked it up to the TV.

item.title: Allie - My Little Sister, Part 2
My Nephew, My Lover
item.description: When my sister was ready to let me have her little boy with him dressed up as a cute girl I was ecstatic. Even more so when it turned out the kid and me found we could do something to his mommy together...

item.title: Rent My Daughter, Part 2
item.description: Emma's mommy continues sexploitation of her little girl for the benefit of easy money and artistic expressions.
